title: Fastest customs clearance for exports
description: In 2023, North Macedonia had the fastest customs clearance for exports, averaging just 1.1 days.

title: Lowest growth in services sector
description: In 2023, North Macedonia experienced a -100% growth in its services sector, the lowest in the world.

title: Highest percentage of deaths from non-communicable diseases
description: In 2019, 96.13% of deaths in North Macedonia were due to non-communicable diseases, the highest percentage globally.

title: Complete urban birth registration
description: In 2019, North Macedonia achieved 100% completeness in urban birth registration.
